Name: The Adventures of Plushie Squad
Description: You and the plushies journey above the clouds, where a world of wonder awaits your discovery.
QuestDesc: You and the plushies journey above the clouds, where a world of wonder awaits your discovery.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fulmine wants me to take pictures of unique views... Wonder where the Plushies want to visit first?

Dialogues.Speaker: The Plushies
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Undecipherable but clearly excited sounds.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They say they want to go check out around the entrance!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Abby?

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe. Heard you needed someone who can speak Echo. So here I am!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: C'mon! To the entrance!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hell yeah, this is the place!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This view is great. A perfect shot with everyone right in the middle.

Dialogues.Speaker: The Plushies
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Happy sounds.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What are they saying?

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They really like the picture you took, and they never knew such a large area existed behind the clouds. Hmm, you mean you guys couldn't see it before?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe the Sonoro Sphere chooses who can and cannot see.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, the Plushies want to get a closer look. They want to take a clearer picture to share with everyone back in the village. Let's go!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A Wingray. Up there! Maybe we can fly over there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wow. Everything's slowly coming back to me now...

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Zargon Garden. Didn't really get a chance to enjoy it after putting it all together.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, there we go then. I'm gonna enjoy every detail of this place as much as I can!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With the swing of {PlayerName}'s blade, Echoes appeared out of nowhere!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's like the scene is happening again right in front of me! Wait a minute...

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Where did these Echoes come from!? I didn't know I could summon Echoes!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, this painting... It just started glowing for some reason.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You know, it's actually kinda pretty... Look at how the stars are lighting up too. What do you think is inside? You don't suppose there's Echoes waiting to jump on us again, do you?

Options.PlotLineKey: How about you go take a look?

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...I might be Solaris's No.1 Echo, but I thought we're supposed to stick together when it comes to adventuring! Plus, who's gonna look after the Plushies while I'm gone?

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you say so. I guess Solaris's No.1 Echo has nothing to worry about with {PlayerName} on the caseâ€¦

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The glowing painting might be some kind of hint. Either way, we'll need to check it out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whoa. We're so up high!

Dialogues.Speaker: The Plushies
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Chirpy sounds.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How's everyone doing back there?

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Can't really hear over all this wind... But I can tell they're enjoying it that's for sure!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whoa... What's with all this wind!? Keep her steady now, {PlayerName}!

Dialogues.Speaker: The Plushies
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Mixed chirpy noises.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I didn't know you guys could handle heights!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What a view up here... Hmm? What's that?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What's up?

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They're asking if this is where you beat that dragon and if you were the one who put together this place the way it is now.

Dialogues.Speaker: The Plushies
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Sounds of excitement.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Welcome back! Welcome back!

Options.PlotLineKey: I see our Echo interpreter is on duty.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Oh, that wasn't them saying it, it's from me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway. How was it? Everyone was so worried they were starting to pull my hair here!

Dialogues.Speaker: The Plushies
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (A crescendo of happy sounds.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, what do we have here? Never imagined there'd be a view like this tucked away inside that painting... The Plushies really like it and say thank you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They also said they'll have a present waiting for you back at the village tomorrow afternoon... A present! Wonder if it's something yummy?

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hurray! {Male=He;Female=She} said yes! Ow, ow, ow! I know you're all happy, but not the hair!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This should be the top.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What a view. So many stars right beneath my feet.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I should take a picture and share this view with the Plushies.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There are so many stars... And incredibly bright.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I think they wanted me to head to the top.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How did a Gondola get up here?

Dialogues.Speaker: The Plushies
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Sounds of excitement.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What are you waiting for, {PlayerName}? Hop in!
